channel.title: Need Some Help :\
channel.description: Well, I recently got a sh!t load of adware and i need a good way to remove it. I got Windows Live OneCare and spybot and its still there. I've also done a trendmicro scan..

item.title: Need Some Help :\
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

get avg 7.5 free. scan your pc. and im pretty sure you wont get another virus. (or at least thats how it works for me) i have had one virus in 4 years.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help :\
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Well first off is to get a good virus protector. You can either buy it legitly, or you can download a cracked version [Which is illegal, but so many people do it].

Second if that doesn’t work you can keep trying to get rid of it with other programs but the best answer if you really have a lot of adware is to just reformat your computer. Which means wiping the hard drive and starting again [By re-installing windows]. You should of course back up all your important documents onto a memory stick or some blank disks so you don’t lose your data for ever.

Third answer is to wait for someone else to answer with a different answer to what i wrote.

Read full topic
